title: Spicy mussel spaghetti

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat and fry the garlic, chilli and spring onion until soft.
Add the spaghetti and mussels, season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper and mix together.
To serve, transfer the spaghetti into a serving bowl and sprinkle over parsley.
